entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New CollectionView2 Handler does not attach Behaviors in Datatemplate #26551
  • Output Layout is in the newest version og Visualstudio 222 preview more difficult #26547
  • Windows: Referencing a nuget package that uses WinAppSDK 1.6 causes crash in Maui's WebView control #26546
    Backlog
  • Unable to remove new secondary navigation/title bar on Android #26544
  • [Android] Some phones MediaPicker.Default.CapturePhotoAsync() is causing app reset .NET 9 and crash on others #26541
  • [Windows]Exception throw when using the GroupShortNameBinding property in Grouped ListView #26534
    Backlog
  • When changing BindingContext, the previously bound item can have it's Picker.SelectedItem property changed! #26532
  • Unable to load MacCatalyst Arm64 dll #26529
  • [MAUI] When switching the theme from Light to Dark some text disappear. #26526
    .NET 9 Servicing

Closed

  • Get C# Stack trace of MAUI iOS without using any CrashAnalytics #26414
  • Enable .NET MAUI on source.dot.net #26210
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] New CollectionViewHandler2 "swallows" attached properties #25195
    .NET 9 SR3
  • After Installing VS 17.12, iOS Debugging Only Works Once #26528
  • Header Not Rendering in Windows for Grouped ListView #26540
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselViewRemoveAt so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25776
    .NET 9 SR3
  • System image download error. #26487
  • Member 'Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Color' is declared in another module and needs to be imported #26531
  • [CollectionView] EmptyView with button doesn't t work on iOS #26508
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Unable to set multiple different colours for unselected tabs on TabbedPage - Android #26522
  • Android FlyoutPage does not display navigation bar NET 8 #26472
  • Error on dotnet workload install or update #26518
  • MAUI App re-installs every time its deployed via VS Code #26525
  • CollectionView Header and Footer leak memory on iOS #22910

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove CastingList from MenuFlyoutSubItem #26558
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [ci] Enable source index #26557
    area-infrastructure, t/docs 📝, .NET 9 SR3
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 10696069 #26556
  • [tests] Skip some tests that are failing #26552
    area-testing, testing-flakiness, testing-green-ci, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 43 #26543
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for Flyout Content Template not updating dynamically #26536
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Set SetClipChildren to false in ViewCellContainer #26524
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview

Merged

  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #26545
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR3
  • Revert "[release/9.0.1xx-sr2] [Windows] Fix crash when navigating pages" (#26478) #26549
  • Update bug-report.yml with SR1.4 #26550
  • [iOS] Moved GeneralWrapperView from Controls to Core #26535
    area-architecture, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 10692261 #26527
    area-templates
  • [ci] Fix provision on templates stage #26542
    area-infrastructure, testing-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 41 #26492
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed [iOS] Fix CarouselViewRemoveAt so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25919
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Use a GeneralWrapperView for the EmptyView on CollectionView #26513
    area-controls-collectionview, potential-regression, .NET 9 SR3
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241209202058740 to main #26483
    area-templates, .NET 9 SR3

Updated

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 39 #26490
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] CollectionView item sizing wrong after refresh #21736
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 14 #25989
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 37 #26437
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix Gray Line Appears on the Right Side of GraphicsView with Decimal WidthRequest #26368
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for Single item alignment issue in CollectionView HorizontalGrid Layout #25370
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fixed Extra Padding on iOS buttons required when image on top or bottom #26018
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Border.Shadow hide the collectionView Header/footer -UITest #25960
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix for UI not updating GridItemsLayout when Span becomes 1. #26370
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix Incorrect First and Last Visible Item index in CollectionView Scrolled Event #26468
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix android image loading race condition and improve logging #25870
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 40 #26491
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android] Input transparent for a content page #25104
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • Fix for issue 24557 Android OnKeyUp not capturing keypresses #25429
    platform/android 🤖, area-keyboard
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22676
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Fixed Using safe area causes white area at the top upon entry focus #26063
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 42 #26512
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android]: Preserve the ActivityResultRegistry During MauiAppCompatActivity Creation #25404
    platform/android 🤖, area-core-lifecycle, community ✨
  • Fix leak on Command Element #26044
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-xaml, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, memory-leak 💦
  • Add support for async .NET methods #25967
    area-architecture
  • [PERFORMANCE][SECURITY] Refactored Regex to cached (static readonly, Compiled, source generated, with timeout for security) #26095
    area-architecture
  • [Android] Fix for Softkeyboard Return key of an Entry control shows Done when the property ReturnType is set to Next #26501
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix more things with fonts (embedded) and unpackaged apps #26515
    area-fonts
  • Make Style nullable #25230
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • [Windows] Optimize `LayoutHandler.Windows.cs` (take 2) #26460
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨, t/perf
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - UI-Test #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Fixed CollectionView reordering last item #17825
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, stale
  • Fix iOS] Fix CarouselViewLoopNoFreeze so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #26053
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Batch CollectionChanged events #20036
    platform/windows 🪟, legacy-area-perf, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf
  • Don’t call NSAttributedString with HTML from a background thread #26153
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Android] Use a GeneralWrapperView for a Flyout View #26461
    community ✨, area-controls-flyout
